FileName: 美股调整，A股能否“独善其身”？（国金宏观·赵伟团队）
Summary: @葆 Frank Lin 这篇文章讨论了美股调整对A股市场的影响，并提供了历史数据和分析，以便参考。文章指出，过去的经验表明，当美国经济步入衰退初期时，美股易因“杀盈利”而调整，国内市场容易跟随下跌。然而，文章还探讨了A股市场能否独立于美股下跌的情况，并列举了几个可能的因素，例如中国对美出口的下滑、市场情绪冲击和外资流入。最后，文章提供了风险提示，包括美联储货币政策收紧超预期、海外经济衰退超预期和国内经济复苏不及预期等。需要注意的是，文章最后也提醒，使用国金证券研究报告进行投资需谨慎，应该经过专业人士解读。

亚洲加息周期渐近尾声
Summary: 摩根士丹利亚洲首席经济学家陈艾亚表示，尽管市场反映出对美联储利率峰值的更高预期，亚洲的货币紧缩周期即将结束，因为亚洲的通胀主要由成本推动，且亚洲各经济体的国内通胀状况仍在决定央行政策力度方面发挥着重要作用。90%的亚洲经济体的通胀有望回落到各自央行的舒适区间。陈艾亚认为大多数央行将在2023年第一季度末暂停紧缩周期，印度央行和澳大利亚央行的紧缩周期将分别于4月和5月结束，而日本央行将在今年调整或退出收益率曲线控制政策，并在2024年加息一次。然而，如果出现更持久的通胀压力，观点可能会面临风险。对于亚洲各经济体央行而言，国内的经济增长和通胀形势在本轮周期中比外部压力更为重要。近几个月来，亚洲的通胀数据持续低于市场预期，9个经济体的整体通胀已见顶，这一系列数据再次印证了亚洲紧缩周期即将结束。

FileName: 对话「NOWWA咖啡」郭星君：去年营收同比翻三倍，「平价与口感」成咖啡市场核心变量
Summary:
@葆 Frank Lin NOWWA is a Chinese brand that specializes in affordable yet high-quality coffee. During the 2023 Spring Festival, NOWWA opened 110 new stores across China, bringing its total number of stores to over 1800 in more than 100 cities. The brand has become one of the fastest-growing affordable boutique coffee brands in China. Its revenue during the Spring Festival period increased by 223% year-on-year, with some stores in fourth- and fifth-tier cities doubling or even tripling their revenue, while second- and third-tier cities saw increases of more than 50%.

NOWWA's founder, Guo Xingjun, said that the brand's focus is on the "sinking market" and providing high-quality coffee to small-town youth who have a desire for a better life. He believes that there is still ample space for affordable coffee brands in the sinking market, and that the profit margins in these areas are higher than those in first- and second-tier cities.

NOWWA's revenue nearly tripled in 2022 compared to the previous year, with the brand signing nearly 1000 new franchise agreements. Guo said that the brand will continue to sign new agreements for nearly 1000 new stores in 2023, with a focus on franchise and company-owned stores.

Guo believes that the entrance of cross-industry enterprises into the coffee market is a good thing, as it helps to cultivate consumer habits and expand the market. He does not see them as competitors, but rather as potential partners. NOWWA plans to replace its 1.0 version stores, which were focused on takeaway, and its 2.0 version stores, which were independent stalls, with its new 3.0 version stores, which will consist of franchise and company-owned stores.

NOWWA's expansion is fueled by its affordable prices and high-quality coffee, which has attracted a loyal customer base. The brand's success in the sinking market highlights the potential for affordable boutique coffee brands in China's smaller cities and towns.

FileName: 爆火的AI绘画，养活了一大批“周边生意”
Summary:
@葆 Frank Lin AI painting has become popular again recently due to its bizarre style, attracting a large number of users to experience it. Although the experience is not always satisfactory, it has still created a thriving "ancillary business", with some listed companies also investing in it. This article discusses the business behind AI painting.

The article notes that AI painting has created a new ecosystem that is gradually forming in areas that few people have seen, such as wallpaper creation, prompt word writing, and art collection creation.

One of the keys to generating good AI paintings is the ability to write good prompt words. Because the images generated by AI painting tools are uncertain, many people often need to try multiple inputs and different texts to get the image they are satisfied with. This leads to wasted GPU computing power and user money. Therefore, some companies with a keen sense of smell have begun to sell "prompt words."

PromptBase, which was established in June this year, is a company that specializes in selling "prompt words" for AI painting tools. Its prompt words initially only worked with DALL-E 2, GPT-3, and other models, but later also supported Midjourney and Stable Diffusion. Users can buy a prompt word for $1.99 and copy it to the corresponding platform to generate satisfactory works. PromptBase charges a 20% service fee in each transaction, which is processed through Stripe.

At present, PromptBase has launched many prompt words on its platform, covering pixel art, graphic design, 3D models, logos, and wallpapers.

The article also mentions other similar websites, such as NeutronField, which was set up by senior product designer Miroslav Kostić and sells prompt words for DALL-E, Stable Diffusion, MidJourney, Disco Diffusion, Craiyon (DALL-E Mini), etc. Its prompt words' prices range from $1 to $10, covering themes and styles from animals, robots to photography, and 3D rendering.

Although there are no specialized platforms selling AI painting prompt words in China yet, some scattered merchants have begun to sell their own prompt word documents and tools that extract prompt words from images. If you search for "AI painting" on Taobao, you can find many products with titles such as "AI intelligent painting installation" and "AI painting keyword encyclopedia," which often sell installation packages and prompt words for painting tools such as Discord Diffusion and Midjourney, while some shop owners have also developed their own prompt word extraction programs and sell them on Taobao.

@葆 Frank Lin 1. 2月制造业PMI为52.6%，环比升了2.5个百分点，各项指数均有所回暖。
2. 供给端方面，生产、采购、原材料库存、从业人员、供货商配送时间指数均有所提高，劳动力供给约束明显改善，企业在加快复工复产。
3. 供给端快速恢复再次体现出我国制造业产业链供应链的韧性。
4. 需求端的修复主要源于居民消费回暖、基建投资的支持、地产回暖以及制造业的新订单等。
5. 细分行业来看，木材加工及家具制造、金属制品、电气机械器材等行业的新订单指数均升至60.0%以上高位景气区间。
6. 装备制造业、高技术制造业、高耗能行业和消费品行业PMI分别为54.5%、53.6%、51.6%和51.3%，环比均有所提高。
7. 需求端修复主要受到居民消费回暖、基建投资的支持、地产回暖以及制造业新订单等因素的影响。

FileName: 亮眼的新出口订单，指向出口反弹？（国金宏观·赵伟团队）
Summary:
报告概要：

本报告关注国家统计局公布的2023年2月制造业PMI指数，指数录得52.6%，较上月提升2.5个百分点。报告指出，经济景气已全面回升，但需要谨慎看待PMI新出口订单对出口的指示，因为疫情之后，PMI新出口订单与出口经常出现反向变化，不宜仅以PMI新出口订单回升就判断出口明显改善。此外，制造业PMI指数采用行业加权方式构建，而出口行业与PMI权重行业存在差异，导致PMI新出口订单变化对出口的指示减弱。总体来说，经济景气修复延续，制造业PMI超预期回升，中小企业修复快于大企业。

FileName: 这些新增的奇葩职位，你应该都应聘不上
Summary: @葆 Frank Lin 这 article 是关于现代企业中出现的一些奇怪职位和面试题。在讨论这些职位和面试题之前，文章首先指出了“金三银四”的到来，即大量毕业生涌入社会开始寻找工作的时间段。接着，文章列举了一些奇怪的面试题，比如“你如何把一只长颈鹿放在冰箱里？”以及“星期五下午2点半深圳科技园有多少人在用Facebook？”。文章指出，这些问题可能很奇怪，但是现代企业就是这样，喜欢让人出其不意。接下来，文章介绍了一些奇怪的职位，这些职位可能涉及到公司的核心业务，比如谷歌的“星际联邦君王及宇宙指挥官”，该职位负责谷歌月球X大奖等太空项目。文章指出，谷歌相信月球非常适合作为人类进一步进军太阳系其他星球的跳板，并为解决一系列人类居住环境的问题提供全新的方案。此外，谷歌也成立了一个X实验室，该实验室就称自己为「探月工厂」，目标就是追求通过发明全新技术来解决人类面临的重大问题。最后，文章指出，尽管这些职位和面试题看起来奇怪，但在试图解决这些问题的过程中，可能会涌现出很多核心技术。

FileName: 低调的唯品会，连续41个季度盈利
Summary: @葆 Frank Lin 唯品会2022年净利同比增长14%，虽然净营收下降了11.9%，GMV下降了8.5%，但保持了良好的盈利水平，连续41个季度实现盈利。全年活跃客户数量为8480万，同比下降了9.7%，订单总额也有所下滑。不过，唯品会用户流失的情况有所改善。全年SVIP活跃用户数量增至670万，对线上消费的贡献占比提升至41%。唯品会的成功离不开其“一家专门做特卖的网站”的定位，凭借着强大的买手团队和品牌特卖模式，占据了用户心智。唯品会还提供了优质的服务和专门超V会员，下足了功夫。其拥有一批高净值用户也是其另外一个大利器。

FileName: 天量大基建与倒闭幼儿园
Summary:
@兼一君-UC~VW 1. China's economy is facing problems with two of its three major drivers, namely exports and domestic demand. 
2. Exports have been declining since Q4 of last year and have worsened after the Spring Festival, with many factories shutting down and workers losing their jobs. 
3. Domestic demand has also been affected by the pandemic and resulted in a sluggish economy, with even the vibrant internet industry experiencing large-scale layoffs. 
4. The government is implementing large infrastructure projects as a means to boost employment, domestic demand, and the real estate industry. 
5. All provinces and municipalities have increased their government investment in infrastructure projects. 
6. These projects are financed by government loans and financing and may not be able to recoup costs and could become a bottomless pit that requires continuous funding. 
7. There is an oversupply of housing in China, with 6 billion buildings for a population of 1.4 billion people. 
8. If the massive government investment does not go towards real estate but instead enters the consumer market, it could cause inflation and lead to an economic collapse.

FileName: 知乎 | 美国最新调查显示 50% 企业已在用 ChatGPT，其中 48% 已让其代替员工，哪些信息值得关注？
Summary:
@兼一君-UC~VW 要点总结如下：

1. 根据一家就业服务平台对1000家企业的调查，50%的企业已在使用ChatGPT，其中48%已让其代替员工。
2. ChatGPT的出现使得知识体系迭代慢的岗位更容易被学习、取代，比如知识框架长期不变或变化较小的法律、金融、经济、财务、传统土木、传统通信运营商等知识栈。
3. ChatGPT短期内主要以辅助、替代文字语言类的工作为主，但以后的发展趋势不好预测。
4. ChatGPT和AI作图是两个生成式AI能在这么短的时间内先后占据人们的眼球，元宇宙的发展也备受关注。

FileName: OpenAI逆天发布ChatGPT API！100万个单词才18元，价格打骨折
Summary: @葆 Frank Lin ChatGPT: 1. OpenAI发布了ChatGPT API，可以让开发者将ChatGPT集成到自己的产品和服务中，价格比其他现

FileName: 1天烧掉10万美元的ChatGPT正式开放API：成本大砍90%，75万个单词仅收费2美元
Summary:
@葆 Frank Lin ChatGPT: Summary of "ChatGPT API is now open for business, burning $100,000 a day for only $2"

1. On March 1st, OpenAI announced the release of ChatGPT and Whisper API, allowing developers to integrate these models into their applications and services to access cutting-edge language and speech-to-text features.

2. OpenAI has optimized ChatGPT's usage cost by 90% since December 2021 and is now delivering this cost advantage to users through its API.

3. Developers can use OpenAI's open-source Whisper large-v2 model in the API, which provides faster speeds and better cost efficiency. ChatGPT API offers continuously improving model quality and options for developers to control the model more deeply.

4. The ChatGPT API uses gpt-3.5-turbo, which is the same model used in the ChatGPT product, and will support at least until June 1st. The price is 0.002 USD per 1000 tokens, which translates to around 750 words per 1000 tokens. For 2 USD, users can output about 750,000 words.

5. OpenAI is continually improving ChatGPT's model and hopes to deliver enhanced features to more developers.

6. ChatGPT's commercialization has multiple avenues, including the newly opened API, and the previous paid professional version, ChatGPT Pro.

7. OpenAI estimates that its revenue will reach $200 million in 2023 and $1 billion in 2024.

Reference: https://www.infoq.cn/article/Mr9V2QKYoNJmhhmI0M1O
@葆 Frank Lin [ChatGPT]OpenAI发布了ChatGPT API和Whisper API，提高了性能并降低了价格。开发者协议也有更新。一些公司已经使用了ChatGPT API，OpenAI采用价格策略来争取市场份额。

FileName: 两会前瞻：新一届政府将如何开好局？
深度 | 恢复通关后，回暖的香港保险怎么样了？
Summary: @葆 Frank Lin [ChatGPT]The Hong Kong insurance market is recovering, with increasing demand from mainland Chinese customers. Major insurance companies are offering significant premium discounts to welcome the return of mainland visitors. The Chinese government has issued policies allowing Hong Kong financial institutions to set up insurance companies in the Qianhai Cooperation Zone, and is pushing for the opening of insurance markets in free trade zones in the Greater Bay Area. The Hong Kong government is also planning to establish insurance after-sales service centers in Nansha and Qianhai, and is exploring feasible models to connect the insurance markets of mainland China and Hong Kong, consolidating Hong Kong's position as an international risk management center and a mature and comprehensive insurance hub.

FileName: 环球财经:走向质变的中美关系
Summary:
@葆 Frank Lin [ChatGPT]《环球财经》杂志于2010年10月13日发表的文章“走向质变的中美关系”中提到的要点如下：

1. 全球只有中国存在经济总规模超过美国的可能，这标志着中美关系“走向质变”；
2. 锁定“霸权头号挑战者”是所有霸权国家的本能，美国也不例外，而且锁定的对象几乎只能是追赶自己的中国；
3. 对中美两国而言，这种“锁定”是陌生而措手不及的，因为中国从未被英语民族霸权锁定为“头号挑战者”；
4. 相当一部分中国人不愿承认中美关系走向质变，但必须抛弃虚幻的一厢情愿，冷静面对这个现实；
5. 美国捍卫自己绝对霸权，“决不当世界第二”的信念是极为坚定顽固的，除非中国放弃自己的和平发展权利，否则美国对中国的锁定几乎是不可避免的；
6. 历史经验表明，一个国家被英语民族锁定为“霸权头号挑战者”，如果自己意识不到或意识模糊，那就必将对这个国家造成巨大的灾难；
7. 中美关系走向质变，意味着美中两国之间的竞争将日益激烈，而且双方应该认真面对并处理好彼此之间的矛盾和分歧。
